title: Drawing, "Tapestry Design with Mirror Images of Trude Guermonprez and John Elsesser", ca. 1974
inscribed: Mathematical figures inscribed in graphite, lower left:  21.5/ 21.5/ 43.0/ 2/ 45 x 40" [arrow pointing up and down]; at edge, lower left:  25 [encircled]/ 75 [?].
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Repeating profiles of Trude Guermonprez and John Elsesser, facing left and facing right.  Red, orange, red, and blue crayon is applied in individual strokes to areas of paper between the profiles.  Based on 1993-121-103 or 104.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Tapestry Design with Mirror Images of Trude Guermonprez and John Elsesser", ca. 1974.
ca. 1974. Graphite, crayon on  tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-109.
